Date: Monday, 5/26/1988
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Danny Darwin



Date: Monday, 5/26/1988
Subject: Progress of Kip Gross
Dear Sir,
Kip Gross is doing pretty good at A Quad Cities Angels!
He has an ERA of 3.13, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Rick Sutcliffe



Date: Thursday, 6/19/1988
Subject: Todd Haney learns new position
Todd Haney has made noteable progress
learning his new position, First Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Saturday, 6/21/1988
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,

Sincerely,
Tom Tellmann
